channel.title: Class files help please
channel.description: [font=verdana][size=small]I got a source from the server download section and am currently working on the project. When I started to work and check important items for spawning I noticed that the ags looked weird, like a blurite 2h sword... So I was confused and posted on how I could fix the problem... Everyone said that it was a client side problem, and that I need to go to models on the client side, however, there is no models on the client side on the server side... But then it got worse, I also noticed there was no class 8 folder, so I cannot add new items or anything... so if you could tell me any alternate folders you know of that is the same as class 8 that would be great, as for the models I cannot fix the ags problem because there is no models, (models is on the server side but that's not what the other people said on the other post). also if there is no alternative folder is there a different class 8 folder that I can get anywhere else? [/size][/font] [font=verdana][size=small]I would deeply appreciate if you could tell me because I want to fix ags, and add in claws =(.[/size][/font] [font=verdana][size=small]THANKS! [/size][/font]

item.title: Class files help please
item.dc:creator: @help_with_my_server help with my server
item.description:
@help_with_my_server wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:2, topic:371507”]From what I just understood from that, is that you went to look for the Client.java for the client in the server folder?

No.

Class8.java is in your client folder. If you don’t have one, re-download the source, because it didn’t download properly.

If this continues to fail, get a different client.

And you won’t just be able to open and view your models willy-nilly. You need either RSMV or a 3D modelling application like Blender or something. There’s a massive tutorial in the model section. Go look it up.[/quote]I have looked at the RSMV and watched some vids on youtube, but I did download the client three times over already and I really like the server don’t want to get rid of it =(

Read full topic

item.title: Class files help please
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

From what I just understood from that, is that you went to look for the Client.java for the client in the server folder?

No.

Class8.java is in your client folder. If you don’t have one, re-download the source, because it didn’t download properly.

If this continues to fail, get a different client.

And you won’t just be able to open and view your models willy-nilly. You need either RSMV or a 3D modelling application like Blender or something. There’s a massive tutorial in the model section. Go look it up.

Read full topic

[font=verdana][size=small]I got a source from the server download section and am currently working on the project. When I started to work and check important items for spawning I noticed that the ags looked weird, like a blurite 2h sword… So I was confused and posted on how I could fix the problem… Everyone said that it was a client side problem, and that I need to go to models on the client side, however, there is no models on the client side on the server side… But then it got worse, I also noticed there was no class 8 folder, so I cannot add new items or anything… so if you could tell me any alternate folders you know of that is the same as class 8 that would be great, as for the models I cannot fix the ags problem because there is no models, (models is on the server side but that’s not what the other people said on the other post). also if there is no alternative folder is there a different class 8 folder that I can get anywhere else? [/size][/font]
[font=verdana][size=small]I would deeply appreciate if you could tell me because I want to fix ags, and add in claws =(.[/size][/font]
